info.name: Make Firefox4 inherit your KDE icon set
info.description: This is a stylish script for firefox4 which will make the browser use your current KDE icon set. It is not yet complete, but it currently provides some icons that firefox4 is missing (like open in new tab, open in new window, etc).
info.additionalInfo:
REQUIREMENTS:

1) Your GTK style must be set to QtCurve.

2) A symbolic link of the icon theme folder to /usr/share/icons
